name: Elijah McClain Memorial Fund
blurb: Donations will go toward supporting the family of Elijah McClain.

name: Act Blue Racism and Police Brutality Funds
blurb: Single donations will be split between multiple organizations with the ability to adjust what goes where.

name: Minnesota Rapid Response Coalition; Twin Cities- Minnesota
blurb: Donations will go toward rebuilding businesses and other parts of Black communities where protests have occurred and/or have been hit particularly hard by the coronavirus pandemic.

name: BLM
blurb: Join the Movement to fight for Freedom, Liberation and Justice by donating.

name: The Bail Project
blurb: The Bail Project National Revolving Bail Fund is a critical tool to prevent incarceration and combat racial and economic disparities in the bail system.

name: The Liberty Fund
